reviewText: The collection had defective DVDs. I had to return it--very disappointed.

First, there are various opinions about the quality and contents of this Blu-Ray box set from Canada's Alliance label. I'm not sure what others received when they ordered this, but here's what I got: 4 Beautiful looking films on 4 discs with correct widescreen aspect ratio's, stunning sound and loads of special features for all 4 films! That's right, if you hear from others that these budget sets do NOT include special features - TRUST ME, the set I received as pictured, includes audio commentary tracks, trailers, documentaries, etc. - for each film. So this is not a bare-bones release! This is a feature-packed 4 disc set, and at approx. $2.25 per Blu-Ray film, this would be a great DVD value, but as a Blu-Ray, it is simply a fantastic deal! Based on the things I read, I almost cancelled this order at the last minute, and went for the individual U.S. releases for each title. What a mistake that would have been! Buy this with confidence!
Excellent group of movies.  Hours of great entertainment.
Just The Kings Speech and The English Patient are worth the price of this set.  Chicago and Shakespeare In Love are gorgeous in Blu-ray. A nice addition to your film library.

This is NOT a Blu-Ray but a DVD set. The ISBN = 065935575481. The photograph is of the correct product, but the product received is the DVD version with the ISBN is covered with a sticker. This has happened twice so it seems unlikely this is a mistake, "Outlet Promotions" was the seller both times. Let's try for number three. [Edited 11-Dec-2014 for inserting seller reference]
Four individual Blu-Rays with 4 great films. The shipping alone on four individual discs would be $16 - making this a very good deal indeed!
